name: Frozen Princess Girl Spa Salon
description:
The ice princess said YES and now she wants to get ready for her big day. Get ready for the super exciting task of an ice princess wedding. Put all of your efforts into changing the bride from women to the most stunning ice princess bride. Do a lot of fun activities in this amazing fashion wedding dress-up game. Choose the best dress for her, do charming makeup, and make her the most beautiful royal princess bride ever. With your unique ideas ready the bride becomes the best wedding dress-up and makeover stylist.

Hello little wedding stylists, come and dress up your ice princesses for their big and the most special day. The six brides-to-be are worried about their looks. Show them that they come to the very right place by giving them the full makeover in your wedding dress-up salon. Take the bride to an amazing spa makeup salon and give her a complete beauty treatment. You have a variety of sparkly wedding dresses. Select any of the dresses for your virtual princess and give them to wear. There are a variety of things to make your wedding dress even more beautiful. Scroll items and explore more exciting dresses and accessories for ice princesses. Unlock the lock items by watching videos and buying adorable dresses which will make the ice bride look stunning. Choose branded bags to enhance the personality of our princess. Girls, time to put some makeup on.

Pick your favorite and contrast make up for an adorable ice princess. Try on new shades of lipsticks, eye shadows, blush on, mascara and contouring. Pick the right skin tone of the bride and a decent style of eyeliner. Are you done? No, you are still missing something. Guess what? Oh, the accessories.

Select the bride’s jewelry, head accessories, gloves, and all to make them the perfect brides. Don’t forget to pick a crown fit for a queen. Perform your duty very well and satisfy the princess bride in your makeup salon. Use all your skills to give the best wedding makeover to your ice princess.

Wait! The fun does not end yet. There is another hidden surprise for you all. The Fashion Royal Challenge, where you will be presented as a model. Dress up your ice princess for the royal challenge in your wedding dress-up stylish game. Present your princess internationally and make her win this fashion challenge.
